title: Bulwark Men's Flame Resistant 7 oz Cotton/Nylon ComforTouch Button Collar Uniform Shirt, Light Blue, Medium
description: This CAT2 FR/AR garment provides a Arc Rating of ATPV 8.6 calories/cm² and is UL certified to be NFPA 2112 compliant.

COMFORT & SAFETY: This flame resistant uniform shirt is styled for hard work with our special CoolTouch 7 oz. cotton/poly blend fabric. It features a gusset side seam for ease of movement, a banded topstitched collar & a placket front with button closure.

TRIED & TRUE FUNCTIONALITY: This durable uniform work shirt has a classic look with a tailored sleeve placket, topstitched cuffs, & a straight back yoke. 2 chest pockets with button flap closures and sewn in pencil stall offer easy & convenient storage

EVERYDAY EXCELLENCE: Our workwear collection is designed for the work you do everyday. Stronger seams. More durable fabrics. Pockets in just the right places. With so many features that help you get the job done, our workwear definitely has what it takes.

FR WORKWEAR DONE RIGHT: As the world's largest manufacturer of flame-resistant apparel, Bulwark offers the industry's widest, deepest selection of fabrics, styles and colors. More people arm themselves with Bulwark than any other flame resistant brand.

Bulwark Excel FR ComforTouch dress uniform shirt. Fabric made of 7 ounces, 88 percent cotton/12 percent nylon. Banded, topstitched, button-down collar. Two chest pockets with button flap closures and sewn-in pencil stall. Placket front with button closure. Topstitched cuff with button closure. Tailored sleeve plackets. Home wash and industrial wash.
